name: Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark - Missions and Monsters
description: Missions and Monsters is the first expansion to Fell Seal: Arbiter’s Mark and brings several new additions to enrich the gameplay.

name: LA Monsters
description: Travel through the LA wasteland with Josh and Sid in this atmospheric interactive video novel.

name: The Adventures of Wolf and Hood: A Jigsaw Tale
description: A fairy tale story told through 20 beautiful hand illustrated jigsaw puzzles.

name: DreamCatcher: Reflections - Volume 1
description:
Riza Wolfe is the kind of person often referred to as a daydreamer. With her high school days approaching an end quicker than she would like, and the threat of a mundane adult life looming over her, she’s always wondering if there’s something more out there. As it turns out, there is.

After receiving an unassuming dream catcher as a gift one day, Riza soon finds herself following a character she thought she’d made up through a mysterious nexus realm and into a parallel world, where she is supposedly one of seven “Dreamers” of legend. She gets what she’s always wanted–an adventure, and a greater purpose…sort of. The problem is, no one seems to know exactly why the Dreamers are there, just that it means something very, very bad is coming. It’s up to Riza, her new werewolf guardian, Luna, and the assortment of companions they collect along the way to unite with the other Dreamers, and figure out why they were summoned…before it’s too late.

name: Rise of Piracy
description: The perfect blend of Action, Adventure and RTS. Begin your journey as the lowly captain of a small vessel. End as the commander of a threatening fleet. Rise to glory how you see fit. Trade, fight, recruit, grow, pillage, ally, destroy & conquer.

name: Saber Style
description: Sabre Style VR, a fighting game that makes you nervous and stimulates adrenaline soaring。

name: Monster Evo
description: The Player will play the role as the Pet Trainer, who can capture the wild Pets in the field and advance them to higher stats. The Upgrade system in this game is called “Evolve”, which will help the pets to learn new skills and obtain stronger BP!

name: A Week in the Office: Under the Table
description: You are hiding beneath your drowsy co-worker's desk. Your goal is to make her climax a certain amount of times each day. Use your hand, office supplies and different tools to stimulate her without getting caught. Whenever you get caught, you have the opportunity to hide for a few minutes.

name: Dama Gallery
description: First Exhibition: "Digital Genesis" Freely explorable digital art gallery

name: Mind Maze
description: Place walls, build a maze, and capture tiles. Don't let any dead ends appear, or your opponent will capture them. Plan your moves in advance, develop a strategy, and set logic traps for your opponent. Get sneaky - force your opponent to make a mistake and cover the board with an unstoppable landslide that will carry you to victory. Play the solo campaign or compete with other players in hotseat mode.

name: Escape From a Deserted Island: The Adventures of Nyanzou & Kumakichi
description: One day, while Kumakichi is worried over what to eat for dinner, Nyanzou pauses from reading his manga to announce, “I'm gonna be the King of the Pirates.” Hearing what only could be a joke, Kumakichi thinks, “Not again…”. He tries to ignore Nyanzou, but Nyanzou has a reputation for being reckless. He forces Kumakichi to come along out to sea. And as expected, Nyanzou＆Kumakichi get shipwrecked right after heading out. They drift ashore onto a deserted island. Help these two escape. It's your standard escape game, on the easy side, and highly recommended for beginners. It comes with autosave, hints, and memo functions.

name: Songs for a Hero: Definitive Edition
description:
Songs for a Hero is an old school sung-through video game extravaganza! Join an unlikely hero as he sings his way through a strange world full of floating platforms, bright and colorful enemies, and many other inexplicable phenomena in an adventure, unlike anything you have ever heard! This humorous old-school platformer features a fully dynamic soundtrack that reacts to your every input, meaning that the hero will always sing and crack jokes about whatever is happening to him, whenever it happens.
The Definitive Edition includes the Heavy Metal DLC "Songs for the Dead", the DLC "Skin Pack", the epilogue of the main campaign, and the Samba DLC "Samba for a Hero".

name: Arcade Archives: Sea Fighter Poseidon
description: Sea Fighter Poseidon is an action shooting game released by TAITO in 1984. The player fights against enemy divers and enemy’s battleships to save his captured friends. If the player's water scooter runs out of fuel, it will explode, so be sure to defeat enemy divers with torpedoes and steal it from them.

name: Super Grappling Gecko
description: Swing over spikes and pits, find the secrets of a mysterious tree, and overcome difficult challenges as a brave tiny lizard in this small adventure.

name: Emberglass
description:
You wake in a circle of speaking stones, in a strange sunless land filled with ruins and monsters. You remember going to sleep, back in your world, on a hill near the cresting lights. Some called it a faerie hill, and warned of kidnapping and dancing and taken to the land of the good folk, the grey folk, the faeries.

But there are no fair folk here, it is empty and lonely and littered with hollow bones. You have only one thought: to return back home. But how? How. The experience is beautiful and immersive. Expect to get lost, and love finding the interesting places you discover.

name: Military Conflict: Vietnam
description: A class-based infantry multiplayer first-person shooter set in the Vietnam War. Side with the Viet Cong or the U.S. Army in an intensive face to face combat in urban, suburban and rural settings of Vietnam. The game features an objective based gameplay and rewards teamwork.

name: Scarred Stars
description: Enter amusement park from hell and escape with your sanity - if you can!

name: FIFA 22
description: Powered by Football, FIFA 22 brings the game even closer to the real thing with fundamental gameplay advances and a new season of innovation across every mode. Play with 17,000+ players, over 700 teams in 90+ stadiums and more than 30 leagues from all over the globe.

name: Spectrewoods
description:
During your midnight wedding in the woods a mysterious occurrence leaves you alone battling spectres.

This is a very short almost walking simulator game which tells a very short story.

name: Battleship
description: It’s Battleship. With fancy graphics and cutscenes.

name: Racing Xtreme 2
description: Get into your Monster Truck, fasten your seat belt and be ready for a rough ride. Let the fire blaze merrily, race the fastest 4x4 offroad monster vehicles, and feast your eyes with the fast jump-filled racing on the beautiful, hills & valleys packed American countryside! Are you able to tame this beast? Jump behind the wheel of one of the 30 extremely powerful MONSTER TRUCKS and prove your skills in hardcore challenges! Choose between Limited Races, Extreme Races, Single Contest, and Daily Race mode and show the power of these beasts. Earn money and discover plenty of truck tuning options! Exchange your money on upgrades like new tires, nitrous, exhaust, engine, gears, booster, and body! Enjoy a perfectly designed 3D world with scenic valleys, hills, lakes, and railroads. Admire the amazing view, and keep your eyes on the road, rivals, and the closest ramp! Speed up, compete in drag racing, dash, conquer the hill, and uphill - the race is starting right now! Forget about casual arcade car racing, it's time to try your skills on a real challenge. Race as fast as you can to become the top new monster truck driver in the world. Play now an extremely fast game with the amazing stunts and adrenaline!

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Nostalgia 64
description: Banjo-Kazooie: Nostalgia 64 is a ROM hack/mod of Banjo-Kazooie developed by Kurko Mods. It is an expanded and enhanced version of Banjo-Kazooie: Stay At Home, being a love letter to retro games of the Nintendo 64 era such as Super Mario 64, Diddy Kong Racing, Bomberman 64 and many others. Banjo and Kazooie go on an adventure through worlds taken or based on retro games from their era.

name: Weapon of Choice DX
description: Weapon of Choice DX is a high-energy, run 'n' gun where each playable character is unique with their own special weapon and abilities! Blast insane aliens, find new player characters, and choose between branching paths! The world is being taken over by gene-combining beings from beyond the stars! Hideous new creatures are popping up everywhere, and it's up to the Solus Operatives to grab their unique weapons and split some disgusting alien skulls!

name: I Am: A Story of Awakenings
description: I Am – a story of awakenings is a story-driven first-person action game. Game play features puzzles, stealth, dialogue, physics, grenade dodging, payback, and lots and lots of explosions.

name: Balls Out of Control
description: Avoid the crazy bouncing balls, get all diamonds and destroy the demonic balls before the time ends! Enjoy of a quick, direct and non-complex game as previously.

name: Paladin Dream
description: Paladin Dream is a story-rich fantasy RPG about a heroic quest. Explore a reverie-like kingdom overflowing with magical locations, characters and monsters as Josiah uncovers the secret of his recurring dream. Can you stop the nightmare before it’s too late?

name: Total War: Warhammer II - The Silence & The Fury
description: This Lords Pack for Total War: WARHAMMER II introduces two new Legendary Lords for the Lizardmen and the Beastmen, bringing new features, units, unique gameplay mechanics and narrative objectives.

name: Heaven's Bazar: Online
description: Online action RPG (multi-platform)

name: Arcane Walker
description: Players play an arcane mage in the game. At the beginning of each game, players need to master more than 50 kinds of arcane magic to attack all kinds of enemies. The collision of roguelike's playing method and magic greatly increases the players' love for the game.

name: MTB Dirt
description: MTB Dirt is a realistic physics based mountainbike dirt game built by passionate dirt riders for the devoted mountainbike community out there. Come and join the world of MTB Dirt!

name: Hentai Match 3
description: A match 3 game with cute anime girls for your pleasure! These naughty girls wait for you to play with them. Contains adult erotic content

name: John Christian
description: The John Christian Game is a story of heroism of a young man, who after receiving the armor of God, goes in search of imprisoned lives. On his journey, he will need to face obstacles and enemies who want to keep these people in prison.

name: Dungeon Looter
description: Co-op Hack'n Slash through random-generated dungeons with rogue-lite elements. Steal from poor (?) monsters and take items back home!

name: Guardians: Royal Journey
description: 1000+ levels tower defense

name: 武林悍刀行
description: The Devil's Cult invaded the Martial Union, and there were corpses and blood everywhere! Only the protagonist escaped, from then on the burden of saving the jianghu falls on your shoulders. In the classical game of fighting bosses and dropping equipment, there are many novelties added to the game.

name: Find A Way
description: Find a Way is a game with elements of survival and saspens. Take the life of the protagonist into your own hands. Matthew is a writer who finds himself in a world unknown to him.Your task is to survive,no matter what, and learn to resist fear in search of a way out of the nightmare that befell you.

name: Castles & Catapults
description: Re-live this classic medieval strategy game, Castles & Catapults, which combines the turn-based planning and strategy of a board game with the action and excitement of a real-time strategy game.

name: Black Hair Girl is Best Girl
description: This visual novel is a 2-in-1 combo featuring two stories where both heroines have black hair.

name: Cat of Monte Cristo
description: A short RPG that is a parody based on the Count of Monte Cristo, with many liberties taken that make it not very close to the original story.

name: The Bad, The Worse & Djanky
description: A local and controller only western versus game featuring ricochets and 'realistic' weapon reloading.

name: Mario Kart 64: Amped Up
description: Mario Kart 64: Amped Up is a ROM hack/mod of Mario Kart 64 developed by Litronom. This mod adds many new racing tracks, new options and multiple new mission and game mode. The racing tracks are based on other Mario Kart entries or other games.

name: Creatures: Docking Station
description:
Creatures Docking Station is a free multiplayer add-on for the game Creatures 3. The game can also be played stand-alone with limited options and a downsized playworld.

Like the previous games in the series, in Docking Station you breed Norns and raise them. You can teach them to talk, play, eat, avoid hazards and reproduce. Each Norn has its own set of genes which is passed on to its children. With this online version you can easily pass on your genes to Norns from all over the world and chat with other players.

name: Bowser's Dark Story
description: Bowser's Dark Story is a ROM hack/mod of Paper Mario. The game is an alternative take on the story, from the perspective that tells how it would be if Bowser won against Mario and conquered the Mushroom Kingdom. The player controls the villain, Bowser, through an adventure, finding allies and battling enemies.

name: Fill & Cross: Pirate Riddles
description: Arrr! Solve the riddles of an old captain Flint and find the pirate treasure!

name: 明教风云之九阴九阳
description: Sin descripción

name: Keep Trying! Zombie Apocalypse
description: Prove yourself in different levels in the fight against zombies - the best: your community helps you. Your community can support you via stream in the fight against the undead monsters with ammunition or new weapons. At the same time, they can also put a horde of new zombies in front of you.

name: Savior
description: Savior is an RPG Maker style horror adventure game. To avoid sudden death, always pay attention and be suspicious of things around you. Collect and use a variety of tools to get to the ground. Please lead the protagonist safely so that the protagonist can achieve his or her purpose safely.

name: Bright Girl
description: "Bright Girl" is a casual game where players can appreciate the unique legendary stories of many beautiful girls.

name: Mario's Vacation Course 64
description: Mario's Vacation Course 64 is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario 64 developed by Reonu. In this game, Mario spent so much time on vacation that he forgot all of his moves, and the player has to recover his memories, on a open-world-like playground where the player has to find and get stars. This mod is inspired by Bowser's Fury (Switch) in its style, music and level design.

name: Lovely Goddess
description: Super easy to really hard to solve puzzles. It's your choice.

name: Unexplored: Mithril Run
description: Explore the dark abandoned mines of Moryondor and escape with as much gold and treasure possible. The Mithril Run adds a new game mode complete with its own leaderboard, achievements, and unlockables.

name: Unexplored: The Dark Ritual
description: Gather clues about the nature of the Dark Ritual, and find the right method to stop Cultist from summoning The Great Old One before it is all too late. Every time you change locations, time advances, and as the clock approaches midnight foul magics start tearing at the very fabric of reality.

name: Unexplored: Ripley Run
description: Face off a horde of alien Creeps with your trusty repeater crossbow. Learn the secrets of the overrun mining colony and defeat The Visitor Queen to set a really high score. The Ripley Run adds a new, action-packed game mode complete with its own achievements, leaderboard, and unlockables.

name: Voya Nui Online Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Insiders
description: Welcome to the dangerous micro world hidden inside the human body. Pilot a ship through the bloodstream. Mine resources, fight microbes, craft items and weapons. Build bases. Follow quests and find a cure for cancer. Don’t get eaten!

name: Magic Adventures
description: Get ready for an endless magical adventure with the wizard Merlin and his a fiery magic wand!

name: Modern Assault Tanks
description: Compete on war and prove your superiority in the tank games genre PVP!

name: Elevated
description: Jump into Elevated, an action arcade shooter where you must battle to survive against constant, ever growing waves of robotic enemies. Unlock new weapons, face harder opponents, and smash your friends high scores on the online leaderboards!

name: Sonata Theory
description: 2D/3D story-adventure game

name: Bridge Constructor Trains
description: Sin descripción

name: Mosaic 1% DLC
description: Deluxe edition content

name: Mosaic 1% Edition
description: Mosaic 1% Edition bundle contains the Mosaic base game, Original Soundtrack and the 1% DLC.

name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night - IGA's Back Pack
description: Koji Igarashi is back! Did you miss out on the original Kickstarter campaign that made Bloodstained possible? Fear not, with “Iga’s Back Pack” you will receive access to the powerful and fan favorite Swordwhip weapon, as well as an epic encounter against a super powerful boss--Koji Igarashi himself!

name: Blades of Time: Dismal Swamp
description: Sin descripción

name: Rescue HQ: The Tycoon - Coastguard
description: Protect your city from the dangers of water. In the Rescue HQ DLC - Coastguard, you have the opportunity to protect the citizens of your city not only on land, but now also on the water and master a wide variety of missions.

name: Nantucket: Masters of the Seven Seas
description: Set sail around the world and face historical whaling captains in this brand new expansion for Nantucket. Masters of the Seven Seas introduces the Challenge Mode, a new game mode set in a new cylindrical map of the whole world with randomized whaling areas, new cities to visit and new events.

name: Guacamelee! 2: Three Enemigos Character Pack
description: Keep your friends close and your Enemigos even closer! This one-two-three punch character pack will let you save the Mexiverse in style. Play as El Muñeco, Uay Pek or Jaguar Javier. Each new playable character comes with unique attributes that add a fresh tactical twist to your adventure.

name: Bridge Constructor Portal: Portal Proficiency
description: Return to the Aperture Science Enrichment Center and experience a brand-new challenge. Finally, you are now able to not only construct bridges, but you can even place portals yourself!

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - 1939
description: Take command of Wehrmacht forces in this second chapter of the overarching Axis Operations Campaign for Panzer Corps 2. Whiles the Allies attempt to pursue their strategy of Appeasement, Germany moves to secure more and more lost territory. Once again, your Wehrmacht forces are called to action...

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - Spanish Civil War
description: Experience the entirety of the Spanish Civil War in this full length campaign stretching from July 1936 to March 1939. Fight your way through more than a dozen battles of the Spanish Civil War including major engagements at Madrid, Brunete, and even the massive Battle of the Ebro.

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - 1940
description: Ther new exciting chapter of the Axis Operations series brings you to 1940 and the offensive on France, the Netherlands, the Balkans and Scandinavia.

name: The Invisible Hand: Deep Pockets Edition
description: The Deep Pockets Edition includes the satirical stock broker simulator The Invisible Hand and its Original Soundtrack.

name: Through the Ages: New Leaders & Wonders
description: The New Leaders & Wonders expansion brings exciting new content to the base game, adding leaders, wonders, and military cards so you can change the flow of history and build even greater civilizations!

name: Streets of Rogue: Character Pack
description: Complete your collection of playable characters with these six new classes!

name: Aton
description:
A 1 vs. 1 Multiplayer Tower Defense/Offense Game with elements of Deck-Building.
It's a one-man indie game by bluewingtitan/Dominik Mezler and currently known to be in Alpha.

name: Heroism
description:
Heroism is an Action RPG game with some clicker game elements, that let's you play either as an active RPG, or as an idle game.

Explore the world, brave dangerous dungeons, gather Heroism, build a party, find precious items, go up levels, learn skills, unlock upgrades, and kill lots and lots of monsters.

This game looks like a Roguelike, but there is no permadeath. Actually, there is no punishment for death at all, other than a short pause, where you may consider your life choices and spend your precious death points.

name: Ravensword: Undaunted
description:
Ravensword: Undaunted is a FPS dungeon crawler inspired by Hexen and Heretic, set within the Ravensword Universe.

THE SOULBOUND ONE
A mysterious island suddenly hangs in the sky above Tyreas. As the Watch, your task is to investigate and seek a way to destroy it. But alas, once you reached the island, your soul is now bound to the devil of the Keep. Becoming a deathless, you now bound for a painful endless cycle of resurrection with no end. You can never go back to Tyreas again, and only by ending the Island curse you shall be granted eternal death. Break the curse and earn your peace to be buried within the Hall of the Heroes.

HACK AND SLASH UNTIL IT'S DONE
With varying degrees of an arsenal left by the cults and inhabitants of the mysterious island, use it to overcome the vile armies or sell them for shards, the only currency accepted by inhabitant of the island. Slash through hordes of undead with any Swords, Maces, and Axes you found; or outsmart them with various devastating Staves that can obliterate them in a second.

TRAVEL THROUGH FORSAKEN PLACES
From foggy wood outskirts to damp abandoned old castle, explore an ever-shifting places infested by undead in a stage-based world system with various encounter types waiting for your death. Explore, plunder, and send the island back to the void.

CHARACTER PROGRESSION
Level up and spend your skill points to upgrade your character stats in a class-less system. Be a warlock with potent arcane reserve, or a brute melee knight that slices through enemy like butter, it is up to your choice.

name: Dandara: Trials of Fear - Enhanced Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Armored Brigade Nation Pack: Italy - Yugoslavia
description: A nation pack with two new factions: Italy and Yugoslavia. Over 250 new units and aircraft from the 1965-1991 era. Iconic modern equipment like the VCC-1 and SIDAM, or Praga SPAAG and M-84 MBT, but also plenty of venerable veterans like M4A3 Sherman, M36 Jackson or SU-100.

name: Armored Brigade Nation Pack: France - Belgium
description: France and Belgium enter the arena of Armored Brigade. This expansion of this real-time tactical wargame adds two factions and a new map. The playable Nations have different army compositions and organizational structures, giving more complexity to the game.

name: Full Kiss SS
description:
Bundle of Full Kiss and the spinoff Full Kiss S.

Full Kiss

Masaharu started at his new school hopeful of getting a girlfriend. A year later, his dream appeared to have been merely a delusion. However, the falling cherry blossoms signal the beginning of a new year and perhaps, a chance for his dream to finally come true.

Full Kiss S

Takuya is always positive but takes time to make the first step since he is too cautious and thinks too much. Entering his second year, he decides to try to get a girlfriend and becomes closer to his classmates Hana and Yuu.

name: Sin Slayers: Pharmacist
description: Sin descripción

name: The Shattering: Secret Room
description: The Shattering is presenting a mysterious Secret Room, a place filled with wonders and surprises. Discover a new environment, deleted content from the main game, developer commentary and many more.

name: R-Type Final 2: DLC Set 3
description: Includes 3 new stages.

name: R-Type Final 2: DLC Set 2
description: Includes 2 new stages.

name: R-Type Final 2: DLC Set 1
description: Includes 2 new stages.

name: Full Kiss SS: Complete Limited Edition
description:
The limited edition comes with:
- Full Kiss SS
- Tapestry
- Artbook
- Original Soundtrack
- PR Card

name: Townsmen: A Kingdom Rebuilt - The Seaside Empire
description: Embark on a journey to build your Seaside Empire! Townsmen - A Kingdom Rebuilt: The Seaside Empire DLC is packed full of great features. Enjoy the new Mediterranean setting, build a harbor along the coast to increase your trade, and dive into the all-new story events.

name: Tropico 6: Caribbean Skies
description: The beloved leader El Presidente sets out to conquer the Caribbean Skies! The biggest DLC for Tropico 6 to date takes the fun to new altitudes with - drones.

name: Battle Brothers: Blazing Deserts
description: The 'Blazing Deserts' DLC for Battle Brothers expands the game with a new land to the south. Visit independent city states, fight in the arena, face desert raiders and southern beasts in battle. Wear new gear inspired by Arabian and Persian cultures and test your mettle in a new late game crisis!

name: Monster Prom: Second Term
description: Second Term features all-new characters, narratives and events that will provide you with countless new experiences in your quest of finding monster love.

name: Blue Reflection: Second Light - Special Collection Box
description:
The Special Collection Box is a Japan-only release that includes:

- Game: Blue Reflection: Second Light
- Premium Box Inclusions
- Artbook
- Bath Towel
- Acrylic Mini Character Charm
- School Bag

name: Blue Reflection: Second Light - Premium Box
description:
The Premium Box is a Japan-only release that includes:

- Game: Blue Reflection: Second Light
- Special Drama CD
- Ryza Style Costume (while supplies last.)
- B2 Cloth Poster
- Student Handbook-style Bromide Album

name: Art of Rally: Deluxe Edition
description:
The art of rally deluxe edition includes:
- The base Art of Rally game
- 50+ track OST by Tatreal, with both MP3 and high-quality FLAC versions

This is the perfect accompaniment for your next road trip, or errand to the grocery store. Who are we to judge?

name: Neon Chrome: Arena
description: Enter the Neon Chrome Arena and challenge your friends and the world. How high can you score in this arena based survival mode with online leaderboards?

name: Graveyard Keeper: Game of Crone
description: You’ll have to help the escaped prisoners of the Inquisition survive in the wilderness by providing them with everything they need. To develop their camp to a fortified settlement while keeping in mind its benefits. To protect those who entrusted you with their lives, from the sword and fire. And also - to untangle the circumstances of the cruel game, which turned into the Great Blast and the return of the Ancient Curse.

name: Neverwinter Nights: Dark Dreams of Furiae
description: Dark Dreams of Furiae is a fantasy RPG module for Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition. The characters and events of this module coincide with the official Dungeons & Dragons tabletop campaign, Baldur’s Gate: Descent into Avernus.

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance - Royal DLC Package
description: Sin descripción

name: This War of Mine: Stories - Fading Embers
description: 'Fading Embers' is the third installment in This War of Mine: Stories. The expansion features a narrative-driven scenario that portrays the story of Anja. Living in a warzone and carrying a heavy burden, Anja wrestles with herself to answer the question of what is more important - survival of human legacy or the survival of a man.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Worlds in Crisis
description: In Worlds in Crisis, you will encounter a host of new world events with ideological choices that you will have to resolve. Several new planet types and well over a dozen new planet features also await you.

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - 1941
description: Take command of Wehrmacht forces once again in the continuing Axis Operations Campaign for Panzer Corps 2. Re-unite with your loyal command staff and prepare to embark on your longest campaign to date with a huge 20 scenario campaign covering actions in the Balkans and Eastern Front of 1941.

name: Archetype Arcadia
description:
The world has fallen to Peccato Mania (original sin), which causes self-harm and other problems.

To save his younger sister Christine, who has been stricken by the disease, Rust full-dive into the online game "Archetype Arcadia", which is the only way to stop the progress of the symptom.

Hope, pain, joy, betrayal, and inevitable "death" are found in this game, where the memories of the players turn into avatars and fight.

A fully-voiced text novel adventure game that tells a terrifying story of the overwhelming volume, led by memories that should have been lost.

name: Dark Side of Fate
description: Dark side of Fate is a perfect 2D quest with hardcore elements where you have to resist ancient evil playing as a forester Noah.

name: Everlasting Guilt
description: if you’re into Doom, Furi \ Titan Souls, this game will fulfill your needs with its FPS, fast-paced gameplay that heavily focuses on Boss fights, each with a unique approach that has its own mechanics, and a load of enemies to unleash your anger and test your arsenal upon.

name: Survivor
description: A wave-based zombie survival game that ramps up in difficulty as the player progresses through each wave.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Hunter/Prey
description: Sin descripción

name: BattleTech: Heavy Metal
description: Heavy Metal unleashes a wide range of ‘Mechs that both longtime fans and new players can enjoy. Pilot seven classic BattleMechs along with one new ‘Mech designed exclusively for this expansion. Experience the mystery of a derelict cargo ship while attempting to take control of its payload in the new flashpoint mini-campaign and crank...

name: Tank Warfare: Operation Pugilist
description: The battle of Mareth Line during the Tunisian campaign in 1943. British 50th Infantry Division supported by the Valentine tanks of the 50th Royal Tank Regiment is trying to break through the German defenses.

name: Sigma Theory: Global Cold War - Brazil
description: This DLC adds a new playable nation: Brazil. Content includes 4 new Brazilian agents, 2 Brazilian scientists, a Brazilian diplomat, Exfiltration in the city of Brasilia, Brazil, and a Brazil trait: your first agent gets Ghost trait.

name: Anstoss 2: Gold Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Among Us: Ejected Edition
description:
Among Us: Ejected Edition includes:
- Among Us base game and all of the DLC items
- Retail Exclusive "Innersloth Cosmicube": featuring cosmetics from prototypes we made that never became full-fledged games
- Limited Edition SteelBook
- Impostor Syndrome Sticker Sheet
- 1 of 12 Special Mira HQ Holographic Access Cards
- Folded Skeld Map Poster designed
- Redeemable Code for 6 PC/Phone Wallpapers
- Crewmate vs Impostor Lanyard
- Purple Crewmate Plush
- Spinning Into Space Enamel Spinner Pin
- Crewmate Fleece Blanket (60" x 90")
- Red Impostor Beanie (6" x 6" x 5")
- Limited Edition Ejected Edition Box

name: Among Us: Crewmate Edition
description:
Play online with 4-15 players as you attempt to hold your spaceship together and return back to civilization. But beware... as there may be an alien impostor aboard!

The Crewmate Edition includes:
- Base Game
- DLC items: Airship, Polus and MIRA HQ Skins, and Hamster Pet, Bedcrab Pet, Brainslug Pet, Stickmin Pet, and Mini Crewmate bundles
- 3D Lenticular Case
- Impostor Syndrome Sticker Sheet
- 1 of 12 Special Mira HQ Holographic Access Cards
- Folded Skeld Map Poster designed
- Redeemable Code for 6 PC/Phone Wallpapers

name: Among Us: Impostor Edition
description: Play online with 4-15 players as you attempt to hold your spaceship together and return back to civilization. But beware... as there may be an alien impostor aboard!

name: 2K Ball N' Brawl
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Robot Wars 30: Limited Edition
description:
30 years on, the battle for our world's future continues. Super Robot Wars is a tactical RPG that brings characters and robots from a variety of mecha anime together to battle their mutual foes.

The limited edition includes:
- Game: Super Robot Wars 30
- Metal Robot Damashii (Ka signature) "SIDE OG" Huckebein 30
- Original Background Music Digital Soundtrack

name: Real Farm: Premium Edition
description:
Real Farm Premium Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Potato pack DLCs
- Grunes Tal map DLCs

name: Madden NFL 22: Dynasty Edition
description:
The Dynasty Edition comes with:
- 3 Day early access
- Dual Entitlement
- Franchise: 100 Staff Points
- Face of the Franchise & The Yard: The General Player Class starting at Level 10
- Tom Brady Gear Capsule
- Choice of 1 out of 32 NFL Stars
- Choice of Brady or Mahomes Elite Item
- Exclusive Challenges during early access window
- Choice of Brady or Mahomes Curated Legends Pack
- 22 Team Fantasy Packs

name: Diablo II: Resurrected - Prime Evil Collection
description: Diablo II: Resurrected breathes new life into Blizzard Entertainment’s acclaimed ARPG and its expansion, Diablo II: Lord of Destruction, from beginning to end. Return to fight for Sanctuary and discover the fate of the mysterious Dark Wanderer rebuilt in all-new 3D graphics, brand-new cinematics, remastered audio… and the same classic Diablo II gameplay you remember. The Prime Evil Collection includes: Diablo II: Resurrected, Diablo III: Eternal Collection, Diablo III: Hatred’s Grasp Wings, and Diablo III: Mephisto Pet.

name: King's Bounty II: Lord's Edition
description:
The King's Bounty turn-based tactics series returns with King’s Bounty 2! In addition to the tactical depth fans expect from its combat, immerse yourself in the fantasy world of Antara with a whole new, non-linear narrative and deep RPG mechanics that give weight to your every decision.

The King's Bounty II Lord's Edition contains the Main game and the following content:
- Rod of Deception
- Frosthammer
- Staff of Harmony
- Tyrant's Sword
- Armor of the Hollow
- Heroes & Villains Premium Pack

name: FIFA 22: Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition of FIFA 22 includes:

- Limited Time Offer – FUT Heroes Player item
- Ones to Watch Player item
- 4 Days Early Access
- 4,600 FIFA Points
- Team of the Week 1 Player item
- Kylian Mbappé Loan item
- FUT Ambassador Loan Player Pick
- Career Mode Homegrown Talent

name: FIFA 22: Legacy Edition
description: Powered by Football, FIFA 22 brings the game even closer to the real thing with fundamental gameplay advances and a new season of innovation across every mode.

name: When the Lying Petals Scatter Into the Wind
description: A side story of visual novel "Flowers Blooming at the End of Summer".

name: Car Physics Simulator: Trucks + Missions DLC
description: Playable Trucks and Truck Missions.

name: OMSI 2: Yorkshire Counties
description: Welcome to Yorkshire Counties, a Fictional Map inspired by the UK areas of Yorkshire. The map has tight roads and an even tighter Timetable this map will challenge even the most experienced OMSI Driver.

name: OMSI 2: C2-Stadtbus-Familie Vol.1
description: The new C2 city bus family is a vehicle add-on created by OMSI 2 fans for OMSI 2 fans. A total of 7 different versions of the popular C2 bus are waiting to be used in the OMSI 2 bus simulator.

name: OMSI 2: Velbert
description: With the new OMSI 2 add-on Velbert you have now the opportunity to explore another city in NRW in the heart of the Niederbergisches Land with 2 full bus lines. Over 200 new real buildings were developed especially for this add-on and make the city of Velbert look very realistic.

name: OMSI 2: IVECO Bus Family Interurban Generation
description: IVECO, the world leader in intercity buses, launched its new coach range in 2013 under the new IVECO BUS brand. Discover this new series of intercity buses in OMSI now!

name: OMSI 2: Three Generations
description: Take a seat and enjoy the ride - welcome to the articulated buses in Hamburg! "Three Generations" is the first add-on especially developed for OMSI 2 with not only new vehicles but a whole lot of new and unique features which as such have never before been available in OMSI 2.

name: OMSI 2: Man DN95
description: Hardly any other bus has shaped the cityscape as much as the MAN DN95. This double-decker bus, originally called MAN ND202, belongs to Berlin like the Brandenburg Gate, the Reichstag or the TV tower.

name: OMSI 2: Digibus Phantom
description: The Phantom is based on the high-floor version of the Optare Spectra, which first appeared on British roads in 1992 and is a modern evolution of the MCW Metrobus.

name: OMSI 2: Mallorca
description: The omnibus simulator captures the famous holiday island! With the OMSI 2 Add-on Mallorca the player can experience the popular beach region on the Balearic Islands along the Platja de Palma cities Palma, Can Pastilla, El Molinar S’Arenal.

name: OMSI 2: City Bus O305
description: Relive the history of the German omnibuses on your computer at home and explore the technology of the Citybus O305. Do not only drive a bus with automatic transmission, but be the first in an OMSI add-on to control a bus with manual transmission in the busy city traffic.

name: OMSI 2: Irisbus Intercity Pack
description: Discover the exiting collection of Irisbus coaches in OMSI 2. This collection includes seven coaches in the range, ranging in length from 10.6 meters to 12.8 meters, with a rich customization, ideal for your school or peri-urban trips.

name: OMSI 2: Köln
description: As the biggest city in North Rhine-Westphalia, Cologne has an extensive public transit network. The city railway and bus lines are being operated by the Kölner Verkehrsbetriebe AG (KVB).

name: OMSI 2: Vienna
description: A piece of history is back! Discover the busline 24A from Zentrum Kagran (U) to the outskirts of the town in the 22nd district of Vienna in the high-floor bus LU 200.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.9 - KI-Luxusautos
description: They are the eye-catchers in real road traffic: luxury cars. Now these noble cars are also available in the bus simulator OMSI 2.

name: OMSI 2: Metropole Ruhr
description: „Metropole Ruhr“ is the most comprehensive OMSI add-on to date – featuring a map more than twice as large as the Project Gladbeck map. You can experience Germany’s largest metropolitan area on more than 800 km of drivable route, more than 50 bus lines in 15 Ruhr cities and along 2,000 custom buildings and objects as well as on a fully...

name: OMSI 2: Vienna 1 - Line 24A
description: Have you ever dreamt of being a bus driver? Well, now you can take your seat behind the steering wheel of faithfully recreated service buses of the “Wiener Linien”!

name: Minable & Create
description: World-building RPG "Minable & Create" is an easy-to-understand 2D screen sandbox game. Basically anything can be dug and you can create your own base with the acquired materials. Find and collect the people who were attacked by the Demon King and scattered, and save the world.

name: OMSI 2: Doppelgelenkbus AGG 300
description: Drive extra large! Fully functional bi-articulated buses are now possible with OMSI 2.3. This add-on brings the 80-ft Van Hool true-to-life into your OMSI, based on real buses from Hamburg.

name: OMSI 2: Strassenbahn NF6D Essen/Gelsenkirchen
description: OMSI 2 premiere – Get on rails in the popular bus simulation at the Ruhr district for the first time. 15 tram stops (two of those subway stops) through challenging alleys from Essen to the broader streets of Gelsenkirchen.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.2 - KI-Fahrzeuge
description: This second OMSI 2 download pack is all about utility vehicles in OMSI 2. It contains a total of nine different utility AI vehicles awaiting deployment on a diverse selection of OMSI maps, ranging from refuse collection trucks to multifunctional light trucks.

name: OMSI 2: Citybus i260 Series
description: Citybus i260 - City bus of large capacity. This is a high-floor bus with 3 doors, engine in the center and rear wheel drive.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.4 - KI-Fahrzeuge
description: The 4th part of the popular OMSI2 download pack series supplies numerous service vehicles that every bus driver encounters daily.

name: OMSI 2: Express 91.06
description: The add-on "Express 91.06" is a semi-fictitious French map that will allow you to discover the express line 91.06. It starts at the bus station of Massy Palaiseau in France and allows you to cross a plateau inspired by the French Silicon Valley.

name: OMSI 2: Bad Hügelsdorf 2020
description: The Baden County in the southwest of Germany is considered one of the most scenic areas of the German republic. It is in this landscape that the OMSI2 add-on Bad Huegelsdorf 2020 plays.

name: OMSI 2: Luzern - Linie 24
description: Line 24 leads from the Lucerne main railway station across the lake bridge towards the traffic building to Meggen. At the crossing of the lake, passengers can admire the world-famous "Kapellbrücke" with its striking tower.

name: OMSI 2: Berlin X10
description: X10 Berlin - The express bus between City West and Brandenburg is the first add-on for "OMSI 2" created by the developers of Halycon. The modern Berlin out of the perspective of a bus driver is a captivating experience. It`s a challenge to take on the daily schedule without accidents.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.5 - KI-Menschen
description: Who is Sid Surley? Don’t worry, you’ll have a chance to meet the grouchy pensioner soon enough. Sid Surley and lots more new passengers are waiting to board in the OMSI 2 Add-on Downloadpack Vol. 5!

name: OMSI 2: Urbino Stadtbusfamilie
description: The add-on “Urbino Citybus Series” for OMSI 2 includes two 18 m articulated buses, two 12 m solo buses, and one 15 m three-axle solo bus.

name: OMSI 2: Aachen
description: In the OMSI 2: Aachen – The imperial city“, the Aachen bus routes 33 and 73 with a total length of 22km have been faithfully recreated. These two routes run through the old emperor city, from the town’s east into the thriving city centre.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.6 - KI-Menschen
description: A New AI people pack is back for OMSI 2 and this time they bring new bus drivers.

name: OMSI 2: Saint-Servan
description: The OMSI 2-AddOn Saint-Servan presents 8 lines of this large network connecting the center of Saint-Servan with the districts and villages in the north of the metropolis (such as Salérin, Monfort-sur-Rhé, Le Roc Saint-André, etc.).

name: OMSI 2: Masterbus Gen 3 Pack
description: This DLC is a pack of highly accurate renditions of the Wright Gemini 3 series of buses, including Streetdeck, B5TL, and B5LH variants.

name: OMSI 2: K-Bergbahn
description: The beautiful town „Zille“ is a tourist place in Sauerland. Especially many tourists from Lower Saxony and Ruhr district go there. They have the opportunity to spend a nice day or even a vacation in „Zille“.

name: OMSI 2: Busbetrieb-Simulator
description: The Bus Company Simulator brings three brand-new features to OMSI 2: Single player and Multiplayer career modes, comprehensive company management and a sophisticated economy system.

name: OMSI 2: Düsseldorf M2
description: With the new OMSI 2 Mini DLC you can expand the OMSI 2 Dusseldorf Add-On by another 11km drivable route in the northern part of the city with the Metrobus line M2.

name: OMSI 2: Düsseldorf - Linie 721
description: With the new OMSI 2 mini add-on you can expand the OMSI 2 Düsseldorf add-on route by another 17km drivable route across the city center with the line 721.

name: OMSI 2: Rheinhausen
description: Variety is the spice of life. And the OMSI 2 Add-On- Rheinhausen is certainly jam-packed with variety. As well as the challenges of driving a bus in urban traffic, virtual bus drivers also have tempting opportunities to manoeuvre a large vehicle safely through traffic on interurban routes.

name: OMSI 2: Wuppertal Buslinie 639
description: With the new OMSI 2 Mini DLC you expand Wuppertal by 6km mobile route through the mountains of the district Sonnborn. Here you connect with the new bus line 639 the mountainous regions of Wuppertal with the suspension railway, the S-Bahn station Zoologischer Garten and the green Wuppertal Zoo.

name: OMSI 2: Leitstellen-Simulator
description: Join a control center event as a bus driver at any time and be part of it! Work together with the control center to complete your shifts perfectly and get the passengers to their destination safely and on time.

name: OMSI 2: Berlin BRT
description: Berlin BRT - Bus Rapid Transit is the new OMSI map for all Berlin lovers!

name: Effie: Galand's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: OMSI 2: Projekt Gladbeck
description: Hop on and be a bus driver on more than 35 recreated bus lines through cities like Gladbeck, Bottrop, Gelsenkirchen, Essen, Recklinghausen, Marl and Dortmund! Here´s the deal: 1,000 objects and buildings on 500km of accessible route - guaranteeing more than 2,000 hours of driving fun!

name: OMSI 2: Studio Polygon Lite Pack
description: The Studio Polygon Lite Pack is a low-floor midibus introduced in 2010. It was originally available in only one body style, which is the wheel forward of the door, and was before the door forward of the wheel.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.3 - KI-Menschen
description: This third volume in the OMSI download pack series is dedicated to the passengers and other people encountered on OMSI maps. OMSI 2 Download Pack Vol. 3 contains people with 5 different body types and a large range of different characteristics and clothing styles.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.8 - KI-Menschen
description: In the 8th part of the OMSI 2 download pack series, the variety becomes even greater, because more AI humans are waiting to be released into the maps. In addition, the pack offers new male and female bus drivers.

name: OMSI 2: Hamburger Buspaket
description: The vehicle expansion “Hamburg Buses” adds three of Hamburg’s city buses from the latest 2017 generation to OMSI. This includes the 21 metre long large-capacity articulated bus with 4 axles as well as the solo and articulated variants with 12 and 13 metres, respectively.

name: OMSI 2: Citybus O305G
description: The „Citybus O305G“ allows you to take a journey through time. The „Citybus O305G “ as a pure vehicle add-on aims to build a virtual monument for the articulated pusher busses of the first generation and sends you right back in the early 1980s.

name: OMSI 2: Chicago Downtown
description: Catch a fresh breeze for OMSI 2: Chicago is the third largest city of the U.S. and delivers an unique scenario with completely new vehicles and scenery objects. Welcome to "Windy City" at Lake Michigan!

name: OMSI 2: München City
description: „The heartfelt cosmopolitan city“! With the new OMSI 2 add-on München City players will be driving modern MAN Lion's City buses through central Munich with some of its scenic boroughs like Schwabing, Maxvorstadt, Lehel, Haidhausen and Bogenhausen.

name: OMSI 2: Bremen-Nord
description: Following the OMSI add-ons Berlin X10 and Rheinhausen, the third OMSI routes add-on from Halycon Media takes players to the beautiful city of Bremen in northern Germany.

name: OMSI 2: VanHool Generationen Reihe
description: With the new and complimentary DLC „VanHool Generationen Reihe“ we get the forgotten coach series of VanHool on your harddrive. Twelve different busses are in the pack included.

name: OMSI 2: Citybus 628c & 628g LF
description: Citybus 628c & 628g LF – add-on for OMSI 2 depicting realistic buses manufactured in Turkey, dedicated to Middle-East Europe, cheaper version of bus called a o530 produced in Germany.

name: OMSI 2: OmniNavigation
description: The navigation system clearly shows you your current route and your current location. So you don't need the often confusing OMSI 2 help arrows anymore and you can easily find the right way at every intersection.

name: OMSI 2: Hamburg
description: OMSI: Hamburg is an add-on for OMSI - The Bus Simulator for PC. Drive your 40ft city bus from the 1990s in multiple versions on the authentic Hamburg bus line 109 and 688.

name: OMSI 2: E-Bus Hamburg
description: Vision becomes reality – after the first battery electric buses of the type eCitaro have been standardly put in operation in Hamburg in summer 2018, this modern city bus now finds its way into OMSI 2 as well.

name: OMSI 2: Heuliez Bus-Pack Access Bus GX327
description: Heuliez is a French coachbuilder based in Rorthais in the Deux-Sèvres. Despite its very long history, the manufacturer is still known for its ability to maintain 100% French production by workers and not by robots.

name: OMSI 2: HafenCity - Hamburg Modern
description: On the road again in the Hanseatic city! With two modern hybrid buses, the OMSI 2 add-on “HafenCity – Hamburg modern” takes you along two new lines through the “Speicherstadt” (warehouse district) and “HafenCity” (HarbourCity).

name: OMSI 2: Vienna 2 - Line 23A
description: Have you ever dreamt of being a bus driver? Well, now you can take your seat behind the steering wheel of faithfully recreated service buses of the “Wiener Linien”!

name: OMSI 2: Düsseldorf
description: Experience the North Rhine-Westphalian regional capital with two Urbino IV versions on routes for five accessible bus lines – amongst others the metrobus line M3. Pass skyscrapers and drive through the daily rush hour in the midst of the city.

name: OMSI 2: Grand Paris-Moulon
description: Bienvenue en France! We are heading back to France. The Add-on Grand Paris Moulon - With the Express 91.06 through France from developer Creations AgoraS-114 plays in the area south of Paris.

name: OMSI 2: Wuppertal
description: On the road in Wuppertal: With the new OMSI 2 Add-on Wuppertal you now have the opportunity to discover the “large green city” with lots of realistically modelled buildings along 21 km of route.

name: Streets of Rage 4: Anniversary Edition
description: Streets of Rage 4 is an all-new continuation of the iconic arcade brawler series known for its radical fights, jammin’ ‘90s beats and dashing sparring gloves and bandanas. The Streets of Rage 4: Anniversary Edition includes the base game, 3 new playable characters, new weapons and enemies, and character customization where you can build your own fighting style with new moves.

name: Supreme Commander 2: Infinite War Battle Pack
description: Get ready for some awesome new features and upgrades developed by Chris Taylor and the team at Gas Powered Games - The Infinite War Battle Pack for SUPREME COMMANDER 2 featuring a whole host of new maps, units, experimentals, tech tree upgrades, and boosts for PC!

name: Little Big Workshop: The Evil
description: The Evil DLC expands on what makes Little Big Workshop great! Your factory is turning profits week after week but you still feel unfulfilled? Then it’s time to crank the corporate greed dial all the way to sinister! Bladh will be thrilled.

name: Tropico 6: Lobbyistico
description: Join the EU in their investigations into 'corruptionomics' and unlock new powerful perks in 'Lobbyistico' for Tropico 6.

name: Tropico 6: Spitter
description: It's all about the fame and prestige. Nobody knows this better than a self-declared statesman, such as El Presidente. Tropico 6's second DLC skyrockets you into the world of stardom and illustriousness.

name: Space Shooter
description: Become the best spaceship pilot with Space Shooter which is an arcade game that can quickly wake up your hardworking side

name: Wars Across The World: Levant 1941
description: Levant 1941 is the Second World War in the Middle East. The British Empire must successively crush the coup in Iraq, seize Vichy France-held Syria and Lebanon, before finally entering Iran to set up a supply route to the Soviet Union. The Axis must do its utmost to prevent this strict schedule.

name: Carcassonne: The Official Board Game - The Princess & the Dragon
description: Carcassonne: The Princess & the Dragon is an expansion for Carcassonne: The Official Board Game. Check out the rampaging Dragon Meeple: move it so he can eat up your opponents' Meeples... Unless he eats you first and ruins all your plans! Ask for help from the Fairy Meeple. She will protect you from the Dragon, and not just that - she will use her fairy magic to give you bonus points! Have fun with new tiles: the Magic portals. Teleport your Meeples to other tiles using the Magic portals. As for the Princess, all the Meeples will fight to join her ranks: if there's a Princess in the city, remove all rival Meeples to try to become the knight of the city!

name: The Escapists 2: Dungeons and Duct Tape
description: This content requires the base game The Escapists 2 on steam in order to play.

name: The Escapists 2: Big Top Breakout
description: A clown's life awaits in Big Top Breakout!

name: Wars Across the World: Serbia 1914
description: Serbia 1914 simulates the Austro-Hungarian offensives against Serbia and Montenegro during the first month of WW1, in the Balkans. Three Austrian armies must crush Serbian forces and capture Belgrade. The Serbians are powerful, but their resources are scarce, whether to resist...or counter-attack!

name: Wars Across the World: Mexico 1519
description: In April 1519, Hernán Cortés lands on the Gulf of Mexico coastline at the head of a Spanish expedition from Cuba, where he establishes the city of Villa Rica de Vera Cruz. Local population welcome is warm, as they see him as the envoy of the god Quetzalcóatl (the famous feathered serpent).

name: Wars Across the World: Franche-Comté 1636
description: Franche-Comté 1636 takes place during the so-called Ten Years' war, in the Modern era. The Franche-Comté player has to repel the French and Weimarian assaults by defending strategic places. This scenario allows Francs-Comtois to win by a diplomatic victory later in the game, via a peace treaty.

name: Wars Across the World: Illyria 229
description: Illyria 229 BC. Rome is looking eastward. In the Adriatic Sea, Illyrian pirates wage terror and their exactions push Rome to intervene. The Illyrians must capture a maximum of Greek cities while avoiding being crushed by Roman Legions and ships.

name: Wars Across the World: Switzerland 1937
description: Switzerland 1937 is the simulation of a fictive civil war in Switzerland, based on the unfinished and unpublished novel 'Eternal War'. It's the history of a Europe that never could recover from World War One and the Great Depression. In most European countries, conditions prevailing are tantamount to civil war.

name: Wars Across the World: Nordwind 1945
description: Nordwind 1945 is the last German offensive in the west. By New Year's eve, the Germans enter Alsace from the north and try to reach Saverne,pushing back American and French forces. Can the Allies contain and then repulse their enemy, in the midst of one of the most severe winter of the period in the area?

name: Wars Across the World: Galicia 1914
description: Galicia 1914 is the story of the first weeks of the Great War between Russia and Austria-Hungary. Three Austrian armies (plus one soon coming from Serbia) are initially deployed against 4 armies of the Czar. Can Austria-Hungary keep the control of Galicia in front of the Russian steamroller?

name: Wars Across the World: Columbus 1492
description: Columbus 1492 retraces the exceptional and tragic journey of the discoverer of America, Christopher Columbus. You will discover the unknown, build colonies and search for gold. Opposition will be great, between storms, mutinies and natives, not to mention many other pitfalls on the road to glory...

name: Wars Across the World: Korea 1592
description: Korea 1592 relates the story of the Imjin War, the toughest conflict in the end of the 16th century in Asia, depicting the invasion of the Joeson kingdom of Korea by the Samurai armies of Japan's master, Hideyoshi.

name: Wars Across the World: Uganda 1979
description: Uganda 1979 is the depiction of the last offensive of megalomaniac tyrant of Uganda, Amin Dada, against his neighbour Tanzania from 1978. The Ugandans must hold the province of Kagera and repel the enemy offensive. Tanzanians must first and foremost overthrow Amin Dada by capturing his capital.

name: Superhot: One of Us Bundle
description: This bundle contains SUPERHOT - the award-winning first-person shooter in which time moves only when you move - and SUPERHOT: MIND CONTROL DELETE - the followup title painstakingly created over three years of grueling production to satisfy your intense need for more SUPERHOT.

name: Wars Across the World: Soccer 1969
description: Soccer 1969 relates the 'Soccer War' that opposed Honduras and Salvador in July 1969 following a very tense football game. The Salvadoran army sets up an offensive with the aim of overthrowing Honduras president, accused of spoliation against Salvadorian immigrants.

name: Wars Across the World: Kippur 1973
description: Kippur 1973 allows to replay the Arab-Israeli war of October 1973. The Arab side, mostly Egypt and Syria, attacks Israeli troops by surprise simultaneously in the Sinai and the Golan, to get a foothold again on their land claims. Israel must hold and then counter-attack to obtain victory.

name: Wars Across the World: Bouvines 1214
description: Bouvines 1214 tells the War of 1213-1214 between crown of France against a coalition of England, Flanders and Holy Roman Empire. The French must consolidate their gains and punish the rebel Count of Flanders. The Coalition needs to spread out French forces, defeat them and stop the rise of France.

name: Wars Across the World: Burma 1942
description: Burma 1942 is the recreation of the Japanese onslaught against Burma in the first months of 1942. Four Japanese divisions, supported by their Thai allies must conquer the whole of Burma before Monsoon sets in.

name: Wars Across the World: Coral Sea 1942
description: Coral Sea 1942 covers the May 1942 Japanese invasion attempt of New Guinea, and the air and naval campaigns around it. The Japanese forces must capture Port Moresby and establish bases in the Solomon islands, but their offensive could be well stopped by the Allies naval and air forces.

name: Wars Across the World: Innsmouth 1928
description: Innsmouth 1928 is a simulation of the assault of the Police, FBI and U.S.Coast Guard and National Guard on the degenerate town of Innsmouth, populated by monstrous creatures. This is a mod on the Ctulluh universe.

name: Tropico 6: The Llama of Wall Street
description: It's time to play in the major leagues! El Presidente is descending on the world of international brands, big time. Power in politics is never enough for a man with ambitions as great as El Prez, so join forces with the trustworthy broker, and help Tropico to establish its status as a global megabrand.

name: X4: Cradle of Humanity
description: X4: Cradle of Humanity, the second big expansion for X4: Foundations, significantly increases the size of the game's universe with new sectors, story missions and game-starts, while also welcoming two Terran factions, along with their economy, ships, weapons and stations.

name: Titan Quest: Legendary Edition
description:
An epic Titan battle, as complete as never before
This is the complete edition of Titan Quest, including all DLCs and technical updates. You get the all-encompassing experience of an unbridled, truly heroic journey through the worlds of Titan Quest!

name: BattleTech: Urban Warfare
description: Urban Warfare brings 'Mech combat to the vast cityscapes of the Inner Sphere! Electronic warfare, large-scale building destruction, environmental mechanics, new enemy units and more make the urban sprawl a whole new battlefield.

name: Battletech: Mercenary Collection
description: BATTLETECH Mercenary Collection is the ultimate BATTLETECH bundle, including the Digital Deluxe Edition and the Season Pass, which gives players access to three upcoming expansions.

description:
This bundle includes 4 iconic co-op arcade games:

- Two Crude
- Joe & Mac - Caveman Ninja

- Gate of Doom

name: Shenmue III: Big Merry Cruise
description: Various types of entertainment can be enjoyed aboard the ship, as well as challenge missions which can only be played here. Also, new outfits for Ryo can be obtained by clearing mini-quests encountered onboard.

name: Shenmue III: Story Quest Pack
description: One day, Ryo encounters Zhang Shuqin - a subordinate of Zhu Yuanda, who had helped Ryo out in the past. Just as Ryo thinks that he's renewed an old friendship, he learns that Zhang has been kidnapped. But by whom - and why?

name: Police Quest: SWAT 1+2
description:
This digitally distributed game collection includes:
- Daryl F. Gates' Police Quest: SWAT
- Police Quest: SWAT 2

name: AI War 2: The Spire Rises
description: Tons of new core content -- turrets, Arks, strikecraft, and more. An entirely new way to play -- open warfare instead of guerilla fighting -- if you partner with the Fallen Spire faction. A new level of cunning for the AI if you give them the new Scourge faction as a partner.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Lord of Skulls
description: Sin descripción

name: Betrayal at Krondor Pack
description: This Betrayal pack includes two games: Betrayal at Krondor and Betrayal in Antara.

name: Armored Brigade Nation Pack: Czechoslovakia - Netherlands
description: Czechoslovakia and Netherlands enter the arena of Armored Brigade. This expansion of this real-time tactical wargame adds two factions and a new map. The playable Nations have different army compositions and organizational structures, giving more complexity to the game.

name: Wartile: Hel's Nightmare
description: Enjoy five brand new handcrafted battle boards, continuing the story after Niflheim. Each battle board is offering variated tactical challenges, set in a unique mood and style. Lead your Viking fellowship into the Hel's Nightmare accompanied by the new hero Ogier the Dane.

name: Silverfall: Complete
description:
Silverfall: Complete Edition includes the following content:
- Silverfall
- Silverfall: Earth Awakening

name: Parkitect: Booms & Blooms
description: Have a blast creating fireworks displays using the new Effect Sequencer. Plus 2 new thrill rides, 1 water ride, 3 new coasters, 2 updated coasters, and more in the Parkitect: Booms & Blooms Pack.

name: Sands of Fire
description: Take control of forty tons of pure armored destruction! World War II is raging, and the enemy is fighting hard for every inch of territory in North Africa. Devastate the opposing forces with superior tactics, cunning strategy, and tremendous might.

name: Against the Moon: Moonstorm
description: The update tells the new story of the last bastion of humanity. This time, the young warrior Zoy, accompanied by the half-mutated Mazoon, will travel into the heart of Moonstorm to gather resources necessary for survival of the last stronghold of humanity.

name: Interstellar Space: Genesis - Natural Law
description: Interstellar Space: Genesis - Natural Law is an expansion to the turn-based space 4X strategy game Interstellar Space: Genesis. Features 2 new races, equipped with unique new capabilities, also usable by custom races. Also, 9 new fully animated ruler options, 4 new music tracks, and 4 new leaders!

name: Fate: The Complete Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Empires Complete Pack

name: West of Dead: Crow
description: The Crow DLC contains, the Crow familiar, a new level (The Battlefield), new enemy (The Captain), a new weapon (The Mortar).
